name: sdl2-mixer
description: Multi-channel audio mixer library for SDL.

fluidsynth.description: Use FluidSynth to play MIDI audio format.

libflac.description: Use libflac to play FLAC audio format.

libmodplug.description: Use libmodplug to play MOD audio format.

mpg123.description: Use mpg123 to play MP3 audio format.

opusfile.description: Use opusfile to play Opus audio format.
